trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle de servidor Web <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle representa uma fonte de dados que chama os métodos de um objeto comercial para executar as operações de banco de dados Delete, Insert, Select e Update.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classe fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle em um designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class members provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> membros de classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property indicates whether the Configure Data Source wizard can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> propriedade indica se o Assistente Configurar fonte de dados pode ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property indicates whether the schema of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can be refreshed at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propriedade indica se o esquema do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle pode ser atualizado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property specifies the method that performs the Select function.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propriedade especifica o método que executa a função Select.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property specifies the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> propriedade especifica o tipo do objeto comercial que fornece os dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> método retorna uma exibição da fonte de dados com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a list of data source view names for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> método retorna uma lista de nomes de exibição de fonte de dados associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method extracts the metadata for the Select method from the associated business object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método extrai os metadados para o método de seleção do objeto comercial associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method causes the Configure Data Source wizard to be displayed on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método faz com que o Assistente Configurar fonte de dados a ser exibido na superfície de design visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method removes properties from, adds additional properties to, or shadows properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> remove as propriedades do método, adiciona propriedades adicionais para ou sombreia propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como estender o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência e comportamento de controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyObjectDataSource` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo deriva o `MyObjectDataSource` controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.

trans-unit.source: The `MyObjectDataSource` is a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O `MyObjectDataSource` é uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> and applies a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> attribute for the `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` on the `MyObjectDataSource` control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também deriva o `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> e aplica um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> de atributo para o `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` no `MyObjectDataSource` controle.

trans-unit.source: The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time.
trans-unit.target: O `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método para fazer o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> propriedade visível no **propriedades** grade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> properties in a placeholder, in addition to the control type and ID.
trans-unit.target: O `MyObjectDataSourceDesigner` substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para exibir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propriedades em um espaço reservado, além do tipo de controle e ID.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design visual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> pode ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> método pode ser chamado; <see langword="false" /> caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método pode ser chamado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> é de propriedade `true`, se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> propriedade associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle implementa o o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> é `true`, o **configurar fonte de dados** item de menu é exibido no **tarefas comuns de ObjectDataSource** menu de contexto do controle associado na superfície de design visual.

trans-unit.source: The Configure Data Source wizard is invoked when this menu item is selected.
trans-unit.target: O Assistente Configurar fonte de dados é invocado quando esse item de menu é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> pode ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties both contain a value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método pode ser chamado e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> é de propriedade `true`, se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> propriedade associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle implementa o o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> ambas as propriedades contêm um valor.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> é `true`, o **atualizar esquema** item de menu é exibido no **tarefas comuns de ObjectDataSource** menu de contexto do controle associado na superfície de design visual.

trans-unit.source: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Exibe o assistente Configurar Fonte de Dados na superfície do designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method initiates a transaction that causes the Configure Data Source wizard to appear on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método inicia uma transação que faz o Assistente Configurar fonte de dados aparecem na superfície de design visual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is called when you select the **Configure Data Source** menu item on the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> método é chamado quando você seleciona o **configurar fonte de dados** item de menu a **tarefas comuns de ObjectDataSource** menu contexto associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle.

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the context menu when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O **configurar fonte de dados** item de menu é exibido no menu de contexto quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> é de propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma exibição da fonte de dados com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> with the name specified by <paramref name="viewName" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> com o nome especificado por <paramref name="viewName" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> objeto com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `viewName` is `null` or an empty string (""), the first view name in the array of names that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> is used as the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Se `viewName` é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), o primeiro nome de exibição na matriz de nomes que é retornado por <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> é usado como o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: If no view names are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> generates an unnamed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum nome de exibição é retornado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> gera sem um nome <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista de nomes de exibição de fonte de dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> objects of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de cadeia de caracteres que contém os nomes dos objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView" /> do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method gets the view names from the names of the schema data tables of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> método obtém os nomes de exibição dos nomes do esquema de tabelas de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção implementando o <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades da exibição ou adicionar outras propriedades a ela na grade **Propriedades** ou para sombrear propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control so that they appear in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método cria propriedades de tempo de design para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> propriedades de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controlar de forma que eles aparecem no **propriedades** grade do visual designer.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classe para alterar o **propriedades** grade de um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> classe no projeto tempo.

trans-unit.source: The example makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo faz o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> propriedade visível no **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para adicionar ou alterar atributos de propriedades na coleção de propriedades de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de chamar o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método de base antes de executar outro processamento.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se <see langword="true" />, não exibirá mensagens de erro quando ocorrerem exceções durante o processamento; caso contrário, as mensagens de exceção serão exibidas.

trans-unit.source: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai os metadados para o método Select do objeto de negócios especificado pelo controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method extracts the metadata for the method that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property from the <xref:System.Type> object that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property, which is the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método extrai os metadados para o método que é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Type> objeto nomeado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> propriedade, que é o tipo do objeto comercial que fornece os dados associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle.

trans-unit.source: The metadata is saved in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> array and in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> array of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados é salvo em um <xref:System.Data.DataTable> matriz e no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> matriz do designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> method of the associated control is called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do método a ser executado quando o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> do controle associado é chamado.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the method to execute when the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do método a ser executada quando o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> sombras de propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> propriedade do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> propriedade for alterada, a marcação de tempo de design para o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle é atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método é chamado, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propriedade é true; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do tipo que contém os métodos especificados no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the type that contains the methods that perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations specified in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do tipo que contém os métodos que executam o Delete, Insert, Select e Update de banco de dados operações especificadas nos associado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> sombras de propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> propriedade do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> propriedade for alterada, a marcação de tempo de design para o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controle é atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método é chamado, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> propriedade é true; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> é gerado.
